attributes.title: Sadashivoham 2016 Tunes Your Being into Sadashivatva
attributes.description:
Your physical, physiological, psychological and neurological ups and downs are NOT You; they are of the Matrix! Paramahamsa Nithyananda 
reveals the straight techniques to make you overcome the effects of these experiences in your system and align you to your Intention to Be – Sadashivatva. 
Experiencing Sadashivatva is the space of Bliss, Pure Consciousness – Sadashiva Himself. 

During the Sadashivoham 2016 program, Paramahamsa Nithyananda will fine-tune your circuits so that nothing can keep you from your intention to be, 
especially the neurological component, which can never be fixed on your own . Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains, “Only spiritual alchemy products can tune your 
neurological circuits to Sadashivatva because they are completely all together in a different level, plane, you can’t do anything about your neurological personality”. 


Get out of the Matrix:
 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GM4f2qOWp3w

Declare 
Your Intention to Be:
http://nithyananda.org/video/mahashivratri-2016-message-and-initiation-you-are-your-intention#gsc.tab=0
